features: Australian Gold SPF 70 plant Based lotion uses the natural and effective power of plants to support healthy skin. Made with Aloe Vera and Coconut Oil, this lotion is packed with nutrients your skin will love.
Plant based: with the highest concentration of Aloe Vera, this lotion helps soothe, soften, and moisturize
Coconut oil: this natural plant contains fatty acids to help intensely moisturize skin, while remaining gentle enough for sensitive skin
Anti-aging: when used as directed, this product has been shown to reduce the risk of early Skin Aging
Full spectrum: protects against UVA and UVB rays, as well as blue light and infrared light.
body.description: Our new plant based line was created for those looking for a more natural alternative to sun protection. This line uses the natural and effective power of plants to provide excellent skincare while protecting against burning and premature aging

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Australian Gold sun care products were initially sold in beach-side stores and small surf shops in the sunshine state, Florida. Inspired by the beach that put us on the map, Cocoa Beach, Florida, our signature fragrance, Cocoa Dreams, brings you instant memories of good times and sunshine every time you open the bottle. Embracing the brand’s roots, we ensure each product is formulated to contain native Australian ingredients to provide a one of a kind experience for your everyday protection. Since the beginning, each formula has been carefully developed using these high-quality ingredients during an extensive product development process, assuring each product maintains our high standards of quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Go-To Sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: This is the best sunscreen I have ever tried. It is light and absorbs very easily into the skin. It leaves a nice, gently matte, glow (not greasy at all); Despite how light it feels, the coverage is phenomenal and sweat-proof, which is surprising because most sunscreens this protective are very thick to the touch and feel like sludge when applying. Also, an extra surprise: The smell is not only heavenly, but also not overwhelming (like most sunscreens). I will not be buying any other sunscreens other than this one after this. Highly Recommend!Note: I only use this on my body, so I can't say whether it transfers/irritates the eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sunscreen Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Love that it protects well, is reef friendly, feels great, easy to apply, and smells great. My go to sun screen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: I have to wear sunscreen everyday as a red head that lives in sunny Arizona. This is creamy, non greasy, absorbent and long lasting. The smell is nice and light. I can proudly say I’ve lived in Arizona almost two years and have not been sunburned once! If you’re picky about sunscreen, this is the best! You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works great, smells good, and makes my skin look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Being bald, I tend to look for good stuff to keep my scalp from burning. This stuff is great, and is not chemical-based. It's a bit on the expensive side, but quite nice to apply and smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not leave a white cast on your face or body
reviews.reviewText: Mineral sunscreen; smells like coconut; no white cast. However, mineral sunscreens degrade fairly quickly and will not provide the 70spf. According to Consumer's Reports, mineral sunscreens may have about half (or less) the SPF protection. The best sunscreen comes from Trader Joe's (spf 50, does not contain oxybenzone). Best of all, in combination with the mineral sunscreen the Trader Joe's sunscreen works very well (especially pale people - yes, I am pale).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best sunscreen I’ve used. Smells great but not to powerful. Very protective. A++++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For higher spf and price I like this. It’s a coconut scent but authentic coconut not perfume-y. It’s a thicker whipped texture which feels drier to touch although the finish is as shiny as typical spf. Takes longer to rub out than other chemical spf I own. Would probably best on body if you don’t like a slick wet feeling. I use spf for face mainly so doesn’t benefit me. I’ll use and finish but wouldn’t repurchase. My favorite spf from this brand is there mineral tinted and the gel in the bronze bottle “instant bronze”The light scent, high spf and affordability are the best features of this item.
